response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than what others might perceive. We're offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special opportunity considering the significant benefit it would bring to you, valued at $15,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both the value of the product and your budget.", "product_price": 12000}
